verses.text: \w Now|strong="H3117"\w* \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w old|strong="H2204"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w well|strong="H3966"\w* advanced \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w years|strong="H3117"\w*. \w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* said \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w him|strong="H7604"\w*, “\w You|strong="H3117"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w old|strong="H2204"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* advanced \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w years|strong="H3117"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w there|strong="H3117"\w* \w remains|strong="H7604"\w* \w yet|strong="H3068"\w* \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w much|strong="H7235"\w* land \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w possessed|strong="H3423"\w*.
